    <facet>

    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE2357</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Cell Fractionation</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Zelle Fraktionierung</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Fractionnement de Cellules</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Fractionation Da Pilha</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Frazionamento Delle Cellule</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Fractionation κυττάρων</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Fraccionamiento De la Célula</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">An animation which demonstrates some of the techniques used to fractionate cells and separate them into their components</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">cell</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">cytology</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">fractionation</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Eine Animation, die einige der Techniken zeigt, 
die verwendet werden, um Zellen zu fraktionieren und sie in ihre 
Bestandteile zu trennen</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Une animation qui démontre certaines des 
techniques employées pour fractionner des cellules et pour les 
séparer dans leurs composants</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Um animation que demonstre algumas das técnicas 
usadas fractionate pilhas e as separar em seus componentes</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Una animazione che dimostra alcune delle tecniche 
usate per frazionare le cellule e separarle nei loro componenti</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μια ζωτικότητα που καταδεικνύει μερικές από τις 
τεχνικές που χρησιμοποιούνται για να διαχωρίσουν σε συστατικά τα 
κύτταρα και να τα χωρίσουν στα συστατικά τους</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Una animación que demuestra algunas de las 
técnicas usadas para fraccionar las células y para separarlas en sus
componentes</string>
          </description>

          </keyword>
